scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m  " %npm_package_config_commitmessage% " && git push origin master && cd out/ && npm run export && git add . && git commit -m  " %npm_package_config_commitmessage% " && git push origin master
scripts.pushsito: cd out/ && node -e "console.log('now path on :',process.cwd())" && git add . && git commit -m  " %npm_package_config_commitmessage% " && git push origin master
scripts.pushdev: git add . && git commit -m  " %npm_package_config_commitmessage% " && git push origin master
